# tt-decomp - ReXGlue Recompiled Project
# Generated by: rexglue init

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.25)
project(tt-decomp LANGUAGES CXX)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 23)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)

# Find ReXGlue SDK
# REXSDK env var takes precedence, otherwise search system paths
if(DEFINED ENV{REXSDK})
    list(PREPEND CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH $ENV{REXSDK})
endif()
find_package(rexglue REQUIRED)
if(NOT rexglue_FOUND)
    message(FATAL_ERROR "ReXGlue SDK was not found in environment variables or from find_package.")
endif()

# User source files
set(TT-DECOMP_SOURCES
    src/main.cpp
)

# Platform-specific entry point (provides main/wWinMain)
if(WIN32)
    list(APPEND TT-DECOMP_SOURCES ${REXGLUE_SHARE_DIR}/windowed_app_main_win.cpp)
else()
    list(APPEND TT-DECOMP_SOURCES ${REXGLUE_SHARE_DIR}/windowed_app_main_posix.cpp)
endif()


# ─── Recomp source selection ──────────────────────────────────────────────────
# Three tiers available (in order of best to raw):
#   final       → structured_final/  Stage 1B+C Relooper (goto→while/if/do-while)
#   structured  → structured/        Stage 1A CR-inlined
#   generated   → generated/         Raw rexglue baseline
#
# Usage:
#   cmake -DRECOMP_TIER=final ..
#   cmake -DRECOMP_TIER=structured ..
#   cmake ..                   # default: generated
set(RECOMP_TIER "generated" CACHE STRING "Recomp tier: generated | structured | final")
set_property(CACHE RECOMP_TIER PROPERTY STRINGS generated structured final)

# Legacy flag support
option(USE_STRUCTURED_RECOMP "Use Stage 1A output (legacy, prefer -DRECOMP_TIER=structured)" OFF)
if(USE_STRUCTURED_RECOMP AND RECOMP_TIER STREQUAL "generated")
    set(RECOMP_TIER "structured")
endif()

if(RECOMP_TIER STREQUAL "final" AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/structured_final/sources.cmake")
    message(STATUS "[tt-decomp] Stage 1B+C Relooper output → recomp/structured_final/")
    set(_RECOMP_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/structured_final")
elseif(RECOMP_TIER STREQUAL "structured" AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/structured/sources.cmake")
    message(STATUS "[tt-decomp] Stage 1A CR-inlined output → recomp/structured/")
    set(_RECOMP_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/structured")
else()
    message(STATUS "[tt-decomp] Raw generated output → recomp/generated/")
    set(_RECOMP_DIR "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/generated")
endif()

include(${_RECOMP_DIR}/sources.cmake)
list(APPEND TT-DECOMP_SOURCES ${GENERATED_SOURCES})
if(WIN32)
    add_executable(tt-decomp WIN32 ${TT-DECOMP_SOURCES})
else()
    add_executable(tt-decomp ${TT-DECOMP_SOURCES})
endif()

target_include_directories(tt-decomp PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
    ${_RECOMP_DIR}
)

target_link_libraries(tt-decomp PRIVATE
    rex::core
    rex::runtime
    rex::kernel
    rex::graphics
    rex::ui
)

# Platform-specific settings
if(UNIX AND NOT APPLE)
    # GTK3 for entry point (windowed_app_main_posix.cpp)
    find_package(PkgConfig REQUIRED)
    pkg_check_modules(GTK3 REQUIRED gtk+-3.0)
    target_include_directories(tt-decomp PRIVATE ${GTK3_INCLUDE_DIRS})
    target_link_libraries(tt-decomp PRIVATE ${GTK3_LIBRARIES})

    # Whole-archive linking for kernel hooks
    target_link_options(tt-decomp PRIVATE
        -Wl,--whole-archive
        $<TARGET_FILE:rex::kernel>
        -Wl,--no-whole-archive
    )
    # Large executable support
    target_link_options(tt-decomp PRIVATE -Wl,--no-relax)
    target_compile_options(tt-decomp PRIVATE -mcmodel=large)
endif()

if(NOT MSVC)
    target_compile_options(tt-decomp PRIVATE -msse4.1)
endif()

# Codegen target - run 'cmake --build . --target tt-decomp_codegen'
add_custom_target(tt-decomp_codegen
    COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:rex::rexglue> codegen ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tt-decomp_config.toml
    WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
    COMMENT "Generating recompiled code for tt-decomp"
    VERBATIM
)
